arts.ttl: Spurs cruise to victory over 10-man West Ham
arts.sum: Watch Premier League highlights as Tottenham take advantage of Tomas Soucek's red card as Thomas Frank's side cruise to a comfortable 3-0 win over West Ham at the London Stadium.

arts.ttl: West Ham 0-3 Tottenham: Bergvall helps Spurs cruise to comfortable victory in London derby
arts.sum: The first big chance of the game fell in favour of West Ham, who should have taken the lead in the match through Lucas Paqueta. Soon after, Tottenham thought that they had taken the lead as Cristian Romero headed the ball into the back of the net from a corner.

arts.ttl: Tottenham fans say Thomas Frank made a mistake with Xavi Simons during 3-0 win over West Ham
Tottenham Hotspur smash woeful West Ham in London derby demolition
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur defeat a woeful West Ham United 3-0 in a London derby demolition in the Premier League on Saturday evening.

arts.ttl: West Ham United 0 â€“ 3 Tottenham Hotspur | Final whistle, first impressions
arts.sum: West Ham v Tottenham: FIRST â€™45 West Ham could feel very lucky to have gone in at half time on level terms. A disallowed goal for Christian Romero from a corner (of course) should have given Spurs the lead but the referee saw fit to give a foul for a push on Kyle Walker Peters. [â€¦] Source

arts.ttl: Tottenham ease past West Ham to put Graham Potter back under pressure
arts.sum: West Ham 0-3 Tottenham: Tomas Soucek was sent off and Irons are now without a win in their last seven home matches

arts.ttl: Spurs dominate derby as London rivals West Ham are swept aside
arts.sum: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from West Hamâ€™s Premier League clash with Tottenham Hotspur.

arts.ttl: Spurs rampage past meek West Ham as Soucek sees red
arts.sum: West Ham's soft centre was woefully exposed by Spurs as Graham Potter's men unravelled yet again at home in a 3-0 defeat.

arts.ttl: West Ham 0-3 Tottenham | Player Ratings as Graham Potterâ€™s Team Crumble
arts.sum: West Ham 0-3 Tottenham Hermansen:5 Managed to get his hand of one of Tottenhamâ€™s numerous corners as Spurs started the first half slowly and finished with a flourish. Will have been pleased to get to half time at 0-0. Poor positioning for Spurs second. Made an excellent double save against Kudus and Johnson to stop [â€¦] Source

arts.ttl: West Ham 0-3 Tottenham: Tomas Soucek sees red as Hammers implode again at home
arts.sum: Match report and free match highlights as West Ham are now winless in seven Premier League games at home - their worst home run since 2003; Goals from Pape Mata Sarr, Lucas Bergvall and Micky van de Ven did the damage as Tomas Soucek was dismissed for a lunge on Joao Palhinha
